articles.description: Where the RBI errs is in assuming more regulation of NBFCs will automatically mean greater safety. This is not true, as we saw in the context of the spectacular collapse of Yes Bank and Lakshmi Vilas Bank. Regulation that is not backed by adequate and effecti…
articles.content:
At the heart of Reserve Bank of Indias (RBI) discussion paper, 
Revised Regulatory Framework for NBFCs, released last Friday, is its concern that the problems of non-banking financial companies (NBF… [+5045 chars]

articles.author: Gadgets Now Bureau
articles.title: 11 things you can do on Signal that you cannot on WhatsApp - Gadgets Now
articles.description: The recent change in WhatsApp’s privacy policy has triggered major concerns among users about how WhatsApp and its owner Facebook will be using user data for ads. This has made a lot of WhatsApp users switch to Signal messenger. Signal gained a lot of praise …
articles.content: While signing up on Signal, dont put your own photo as a display picture and dont use your real name to get the utmost privacy. You can do the same on WhatsApp too but the fact that you have been usi… [+180 chars]
